website_summaries.verdict: Amazon's number one selection with over 2,000 reviews.
pros: Offered in 1.5 ounces, 2.5 ounces, or .8 ounce sizes
Hypoallergenic formula won't clog pores, making safe for break out prone skin
Bar applicator makes for less mess
Mild enough to use every day, not just for athletic activities
cons: Some customers commented that this product feels too thick in hot weather

customer_reviews.title: Omg this stuff is the best! I am a chubby girl and I recently ...
customer_reviews.text: Omg this stuff is the best! I am a chubby girl and I recently went to Thailand where it was 90° with a 70% humidity every single day I was there. This stuff got me through! I was able to wear dresses and shorts with no chafing! And I only ever had to apply in the morning and once in the middle of the day! My life is forever changed I’ve already ordered two more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick review
customer_reviews.text: I'm fat, I chafe, it's gross and hurts like hell. This product solves that problem. I started walking 10 miles a day, normally by the 5th mile I'm ready to call someone to pick me up. Not because i'm exhausted, tired, muscles hurt. Because my fat thighs are rubbing together trying to make fire like I'm trying out for Survivorman. As long as I remember to put this on before my walk (applied like deodorant) I am completely chafe free. This product is a lifesaver.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my legs so that they wouldn't chaff while on vacation. I followed the directions exactly and disappointed when this did NOTHING to help. I'm pretty sure lubing my legs up with coconut oil would have worked better as this went on tacky and I found that while walking my skin would catch in the spot where this was applied. Waste of money and space in the toiletries bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Owens

customer_reviews.title: Made sticking worse.
customer_reviews.text: I really don’t get the hype! I didn’t even think twice when purchasing this because of its amazing ratings. But I’m seeing these ratings are pretty old. My best guess is they have changed the formula since these great reviews. Used on my thighs for those Florida days in dresses. It does NOT make your skin glide against itself. In fact it made it worse. This is a big nope from me.
customer_reviews.author: SuzW10

customer_reviews.title: Usually half way through the day he's ready to go because it stings so bad, then it's going home slathering the rash with ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff saved my beach vacation. My son always gets nasty chafe and rub rash from playing in the water and then running around in his wet shorts. Usually half way through the day he's ready to go because it stings so bad, then it's going home slathering the rash with desitin while he sits on the couch. We put this on his inner thighs every day before we went to the beach and never even had pinkish skin, never mind a rash!! It's very dry, non greasy and goes on smooth and colorless just like a deodorant with no scent either. It's absolutely a lifesaver!!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Millin

customer_reviews.title: Purchase at your own risk!! New formula?!?!
customer_reviews.text: Ouch ouch ouch. I’m a 24-time marathon finisher and used to by this stuff by the armload. I swore by it. I had a massive stash of it so only just now had to buy the type with the newer packaging. I’m sorry for the sweaty TMI pic but I just got done with a run and I lost about 1,000 layers of skin. Are there organs showing? Bones? The very depths of my soul? I wore attire I’ve worn for hundreds of runs. The only thing that changed was the brand new container of BodyGlide and how loud I’m going to scream when the hot shower water hits my shredded skin. NOT RECOMMENDED.
customer_reviews.author: Grammar Snob

customer_reviews.title: terrible!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell you how disappointed I am in this product. I have used Body Glide for years. I had been using up an old tube and apparently in the mean time the formula was changed. I could easily run with no chafing for hours...Like 2.5 hours. No chafing EVER. The old stuff was great!! then my new tube arrived and WTF? I was chafing after 30 mins! So I though I didn't put enough on as it was a new tube...so the next time I ran I slathered it on and then I got 45 mins before I started chafing. SHAME ON BODY GLIDE FOR CHANGING A GREAT PRODUCT! Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Dederich

customer_reviews.title: Terrible mildew smell
customer_reviews.text: I have used Body Glide in the past with great success, but think that either the current formulation or the storage facility has a problem. I rubbed this on in advance of a marathon last month and at the time noticed a mildewy smell. Thinking that it was just a poorly-dried piece of tech fabric, I went on to run chafe-free. But the tights that I wore--and two more tights I used with this stick of Body Glide later--have a terrible mildew smell that no amount of washing and no strength of detergent will remove. So while I'm thrilled not to have any chafing, I'm bummed to have ruined all my favorite pairs of running tights.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, it didn’t work for either my daughter, or myself
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this did not work for me or my daughter. I bought us each one, for our upcoming trip. Luckily she tried it out to see how it worked (I just presumed it would from the ratings). It did not work for her, so I tried it as well, incase it was just her skin type that it didn’t work for. Unfortunately it did not work for me either. It just feels rather sticky. I will try to find the original Chub Rub that I used before. I would like my money back, happy to return it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: jean

customer_reviews.title: saves my life
customer_reviews.text: Man, I really don't know what I would do without this product. I mow lawns all summer, and sweat ALOT!! Before finding body glide, I would be getting big red painful rashes around my thighs and buttocks area, and sometimes where my shirt would rub under my arm. Since using this product, I very rarely suffer these heat/friction rashes. I even use it when I know I am going to be doing some extra walking, not just work. Thanks Body Glide, you are a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Sullinger

customer_reviews.title: Bad lot of Glide - stick is too soft
customer_reviews.text: This is a bad lot of Body Glide. I normally love Body Glide, but the two sticks I purchased and started to use on 4/7/19 are like hand lotion, no friction protection. I've been using this stuff for 10 years, and can't believe how bad these are. If they changed how they make it, I will be going to a different brand. I will see if Amazon can give me a refund, they can have it back if they want it.
customer_reviews.author: mo36

customer_reviews.title: and while it is better than nothing
customer_reviews.text: I'm an injured runner who's been putting in a lot of miles on a spin bike to stay fit, and it very quickly became clear that my butt and the bike seat where not going to stay friends for long. I bought this to apply to my butt, groin, and pubic areas that were experiencing chafing, and while it is better than nothing, the problem is far from solved. I'll keep using what I have, but I'll try something else next time. I do, however, like that it's unscented, gentle on my skin, easy to apply, and doesn't ruin my clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Angie G.

customer_reviews.title: Did not like
customer_reviews.text: Okay, it seems quite sketchy right at the beginning. There is zero information on the label. None of the standard warning label info, no poison control info (in case a child got it, etc.), no ingredients so you can’t tell if you’d be allergic to anything in it. I tried it and it did nothing. It was like putting deodorant on. You kind of had to warm it against your skin before it would apply. It did nothing for me. Additionally, you cannot return this item or get a refund if you don’t like it.
customer_reviews.author: Wick

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for me. I bought it to use on my inner thighs, and tried it twice on clean, dry skin. Not only did it not solve the problem, but it felt sticky, and actually made matters worse. I had to throw on a bunch of baby powder! So DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY! I would return it if it were allowed, but it's not, so it's just going into the garbage. - Now I know not to buy products like this from Amazon, but from a drugstore or other that will allow returns of products that don't cut it. $10 down the drain. :(
customer_reviews.author: C. Flora

customer_reviews.title: I want to love this product
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for a chub rub solution since I put on a few pounds. I want to love this product, because it does make my thighs glide smoothly over each other, which totally beats your skin rubbing sores on your other skin. But if you're prone to sweating, be prepared to do a little more of it under your skirt while you're wearing this. Only you can decide if the cost benefits of damp underwear is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Elle M.

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend. Takes a few uses to like it for thigh chaffing
customer_reviews.text: So at first I didn’t like this product. It was hard to get on and felt like my thighs were sticking together. After using it several times I actually really like it now. Once you get through the top layer it seems to glide on more smoothly. Also the stickyness feeling goes away. We went on a trip where it was hot and humid. There was one day I forgot to put it on and immediately my thighs were chaffing even after a little walk. Every time I put this on my thighs do not get raw while I’m wear shorts or a dress.
customer_reviews.author: 😸🙀Ghost🙀😸

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: So I have to deal with pretty bad thigh chafing, because I am basically a mermaid. I bought Body Glide so I could at least try to wear cute dresses and rompers. The first time I used this product was on my vacation in NOLA where the temps were in the high 90s and the humidity was almost 100%. It worked! Yes, I did have to carry the Glide with me in my purse (it's small enough to do that) and reapply during the day, but it's worth it! Now I can wear whatever I want without having to worry about chafing.
customer_reviews.author: B0npla

customer_reviews.title: but it is amazing. I walked around all day without ever feeling ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why it took me 30 years to do something about my chub rub besides wearing nylons or bike shorts under dresses...This stuff is a game changer. I bought a stick before heading to vacation in Central America. I wanted to wear short shorts and comfy flowy dresses without an extra layer to melt me in the heat. It goes on a little sticky, but it is amazing. I walked around all day without ever feeling chafed or uncomfortable. Even after swimming I was fine to walk back to the hotel before reapplying with my dress for dinner. Definitely worth a try for any thicc girls out there.
customer_reviews.author: R.LienTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This product works as advertised. I walked about 80 miles in 7 days, in hot/sweaty weather, in only skirts and dresses and this product kept me from being in unbearable pain (or any pain at all). NO bumps, NO rash, NO irritation. This is a great product. The size was perfect for traveling, too. If you're ordering for every day use, I would order the largest size.
customer_reviews.author: BakerSarah

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Glide and Non refundable!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible and worsened my condition. I recently put on weight and been having issues in the inner thigh. I found this item by Google research and it sounds promising that my chub rub will GLIDE without resistance and friction. The 4.5 Amazon ratings also enticed and with no hesitation, I'm like helllll yeah! However, sad to say THIS PRODUCT DOES NOT WORK. all con: application was like rubbing a hard crayon on the skin, caused more sticky friction between my thighs, the feeling is kinda tacky like spilling syrup on the skin my thigh friction felt sticky in the area applied.
customer_reviews.author: LCruz

customer_reviews.title: Bye bye heat rash
customer_reviews.text: Took me years to figure out how to stop my heat rash from flaring up. This was the answer. I don't work out I just do lots of physically involved jobs, I'm always packing equipment and material around job sites, up and down stairs, terrain and ladders. If it's a hard job I can't go more than a day or two with out this. Works right away, no stupid smells, no pain on my inner thighs just back to business. I would like to buy the wizard who made this a beer!
customer_reviews.author: Donovan M.

customer_reviews.title: a skin-saver
customer_reviews.text: I use this product on my inner thighs to prevent chafing under skirts & dresses in hot weather, around my bra line when I'm wearing a particularly uncomfortable bra or a bra in a particularly uncomfortable situation, and on my feet when I'm wearing shoes that tend to rub too much. It works perfectly without making me feel slimy, and is an absolute lifesaver. It may seem a tad pricey, but there's actually quite a bit in the tube.
customer_reviews.author: hjd34

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: With all the great reviews I expected a lot more from this product. I've been using Monistat Care Chafing Relief Powder Gel for years, and I LOVE that product. I have very round, big thighs and live in the South. The Monistat gel is like walking with a pair of pantyhose on. Silky, smooth and lasts all day. Body Glide isn't. It's tacky and I need to reapply a lot during the day. It just doesn't feel good on my skin either. Not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Thigh Game Changer!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't worn a dress without leggings underneath it in years. I was off to Hawaii for a wedding, so really needed to keep my clothing / layering to a minimum. Honestly, I was really sceptical - but I had NO issues whatsoever. I put some on, had a little walk around my hotel room and put a little more on as you can feel where, and where not, you are experiencing unwanted friction. I have tried other things before, and always ended up red raw or worse, bleeding. I am beyond happy with this product. I get to wear pretty skirts and dresses without the worry of chafing & discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy the Glide in the grey packaging for years and it always worked. I bought this because I used all of the original product and it doesn’t feel the same or work as well. I don’t remember the original to be this chalky white. This didn’t work for me, in fact it made more friction. Too bad. The original stuff was great. This says “original formula” but I don’t think it is.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: LIFE SAVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I live in the South and it is so hot and humid, boob sweat and chaffing is a given. I had been using stick deodorant and didn't think I needed this product. After reading reviews, I bit the bullet and bought it. OMG HEAVEN!!!! No rubbing, itching, readjusting my bra! It is a miracle and I will be buying more and using it for the rest of my life, if the heat in the South doesn't kill me first! DO NOT HESITATE this stuff is a miracle and works!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Like a Charm
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AMAZING! I use it when wearing dresses and it works like a charm and lasts all day. Doesn’t really have a smell. My sister used it for a marathon but it wore off half way through and she got some chafing so maybe reapply every 13 miles and you’ll be great!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hugginkiss

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Like many people, I was looking for something to keep legs from chafing. Saw glowing reviews and decided to try. This is my first purchase, so I have nothing to compare it to. Packaging was good, all seemed fine. Upon application, I was puzzled because it actually made my thighs sticky and waxy which naturally makes chafing worse. I was trying to figure out if I had to do something first, but there were no instructions. I didn’t feel comfortable using it and going out because of stickiness. Does anybody know if you’re supposed to do something before applying it or what?
customer_reviews.author: AnnaC

customer_reviews.title: Essential for distance running!
customer_reviews.text: I am an endurance athlete. Been running for more than 30 years, and currently focus on marathons and ultras. Body Glide is an essential part of the running kit for any rubbing, chafing, or blistering. From clothing hot spots to feet (even when running barefoot it works for me!), this is a superb product. To ensure a worry free long run or a race, I use this as prevention on any areas that can rub, chafe or blister. No scent that I have been able to detect, and not greasy or any residue - or any indication visibly that any product is being used -! once applied. Nothing I’ve used compares to Body Glide.
customer_reviews.author: Kit Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Stupid packaging. 😒
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great! I’m a distance runner. Sometimes, during a run, especially when I haven’t shaved in over 12 hours, the backside of my pits, where my arm rubs, gets really chaffed. This stuff holds up great! It’s still going strong after over 8 miles! It’s in a deodorant like bar, which is practical and fine. I absolutely hate that it comes in an outer plastic clamshell package for the store shelf. This is such an unnecessary waste of plastic. I dinged a star for just that and was tempted to ding 2 stars. Get it together, single use plastic waste.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Saves the heels!
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to apply, not messy, not greasy, not “slide-y”-making, and it works just right to keep friction areas on feet uninjured from rubbing against socks/shoes. Apply this to heels of feet and balls of feet - the calloused places, put on the socks and shoes and go. Using this product has reduced majorly, significantly the occurrence of any painful heel cracks. This Glide is so much better than creams or lotions that cause my feet to slide around in my socks/ shoes and my feet to feel sweaty. So glad I somehow found this great product for walking, hiking, cycling.
customer_reviews.author: garedelest

customer_reviews.title: Bleeding monkey butt solved!
customer_reviews.text: Work at a restaurant as a sever. Somewhat new to the job. First week I was chafing horrible downstairs between the cheeks after a couple 8 hours shifts of constant walking back and forth. Chaffing to a point where it had rubbed so raw it was bleeding. Read some reviews and went with this product. After healing my butt for a couple days before working another shift, I covered the target area very thoroughly with Body Glide and I must say it’s been great so far! No more chaffing incidents whatsoever! Hallelujah!!! Def will be buying again if I keep this crappy server job.
customer_reviews.author: Brand

customer_reviews.title: A good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product to help prevent chaffing. As an Army veteran and retired LEO, it helps if you have gear rubbing you. I never needed for running or working out, but I used it at class, where we were in and out of saltwater in BDU’s for a week. It really helped with wet uniforms rubbing or salt crusty ones rubbing. You may need to reapply if your doing heavy activity, but in general it withstands a lot of abrasion , before it rubs off. Its small enough that you can carry it with you, if you think you need to reapply. Not greasy, doesn’t stain and no smell. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: No mess, thin coT easy and convenient to apply and it works!
customer_reviews.text: Applies like deodorant, thin coat. I was skeptical but it actually works. I do a lot of heavy work in my orchards and yards—I own rental property. I deal with irrigation repairs and constantly adjusting sprinklers in the orchard, so I get wet frequently. This product helps prevent chafing when my clothes are all wet— shorts and tank top while I’m walking the 18 acres with wet clothes. I use it between my thighs and under my arms near my biceps. I’m a sturdy girl so I experience friction when I’m working the properties with wet clothing. It doesn’t seem to wear off when I’m wet.
customer_reviews.author: lvfixit

customer_reviews.title: Amazing balm
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I went so long without this stuff. As someone who frequently experiences chafing on my inner thighs while wearing dresses and skirts, this stuff is a miracle worker. The only downside is that it does not always stay on if it is too hot and you're sweating, so be sure to bring it to reapply. I will never again wear a skirt without this on my legs. And it's so cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Changing my life! My thighs were torn to pieces last summer from friction/heat, etc. I’ve had zero issues since using this product. I use it every day that I wear shorts and definitely when wearing dresses. It works all day!!! It even worked on day two while on vacation- even through sand and surf! You can’t feel a film or anything, but the protective barrier seems to carry over even after being in water and taking a shower. I love this stuff. It doesn’t rub off on clothing leaving any trace. It goes on smoothly. I got the un-scented and it is truly un-scented. I think I will be a customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: WORKS BUT NOT EASY APPLIED
customer_reviews.text: I know, it's a stick, what's easier to apply than a stick product? The product is so thick that I had to rub it over my skin SEVERAL times to get a build up of product to actually work! When I had a good enough layer on it did work great! Just took like 40 back and forth passes to get to that point. I almost wished this would have been like a jar of product I could custom scoop however much I need. Which is why i only gave it three starts: works, but difficult application, at least for me.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: It feels like a layer of wax on your skin.
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping this would help with chafing, especially on my legs, but I was really disappointed. I read a ton of reviews and it seemed promising. It was so thick. It’s difficult to apply. I tried applying directly, rubbing on my hands and then applying, and applying directly and rubbing it in after. Nothing helped. It creates more friction than helps it. I thought it would have the effects of oil without being so oily feeling but it was not slippery. It’s just thick wax. Thicker than deodorant. It doesn’t apply even like deodorant, it’s harder to apply. No go.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: no more wetsuit chafe
customer_reviews.text: My buddy who did triathlon turned me on to this product. Ever since I bought it, no chafe. I am a surfer in cold water and get bad wetsuit rub around my armpits and sometimes the back of my neck. Just swipe this on hotspots before you paddle out and you're good to go for the whole session. Works better than vaseline. I magnanimously surrendered my used stick to a buddy who was almost bleeding from his wetsuit rubbing his pits so now I need to buy another one. An added plus is that you can confuse your friends because it looks like you're putting deodorant on before going surfing.
customer_reviews.author: CCRider

customer_reviews.title: Multi-use product
customer_reviews.text: My husband first used this product on vacation bc of sand/salt rash on the beach. Ouch! It gave him a slick surface in between his legs that lasted all day and allowed him to swim and be in the sand again. I found the product useful when running. I get running burn when I run long distances under my sports bra...no more! The last way we found this useful was when breaking in a new pair of shoes. I put it on my typical hot spots and wore new shoes with ease for hours and didn't rub any blisters! Great versatile product!
customer_reviews.author: Pumpitup

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product to help with the inside of my thighs rubbing together in the summer time. I have tried wearing shorts with my dresses but that sort of defeats the purpose of wearing a dress in 105 degree weather. This doesn't make me hot, it keeps my thighs from chafing, and doesn't wear off until washed off. I absolutely LOVE this product and will order it again when I am out. My husband has also been using this to prevent chafing on his bike rides and he loves it also!
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is a life saver! I don't have ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is a life saver! I don't have to walk very much before my thighs literally rub so hard that they start getting bumps and cuts so I used to just avoid wearing anything that wasn't pants. I've tried my fair share of other 'solutions' but nothing ever worked for me before this. I've used this for many trips where I've gone hiking for hours in all types of weather and this stuff doesn't budge. Maybe halfway through the day I'll have to reapply but that's it. The only thing is that it HAS to be the original type, the others are very sticky and gross feeling and don't last nearly as long as this one does.
customer_reviews.author: bf

customer_reviews.title: Great to reduce chaffing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I went from not running at all, to running 15 miles per week. At the end of the week, I could barely walk because the chaffing on my inner thigh was bad, so I'd use the next two days to recuperate. I got this, to see if I could push my runs farther each day, and now i'm running 30 miles per week pain free! I'd definitely recommend this for thighs, or nipples during long runs. While the pain is survivable, it's also miserable to deal with afterwards, and with this, it takes about 3 swipes and you're good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Helpful Citizen

customer_reviews.title: easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: I got this on the advice of my daughter who is a wound nurse. I have issues with my left leg post amputation and thickening of the skin on the end of my residual limb. I got this and hope it takes care of the issue of blisters and thickening of the callus on the end of my leg. I will update this review in the near term. update: 1-25-19, after a couple of weeks of use, I think this product would be more useful for runners and other areas prone to chaffing. I quit using it on my residual limb (aka stump).
customer_reviews.author: Paul 1946

customer_reviews.title: Terrible-does NOT work.  My deodorant works better than this.
customer_reviews.text: Opened up the box when this arrived and tried this right away since I had just taken a shower and wearing a skirt for the day (HOT and humid here this week)......All this did was make my thighs stick together more. Although gross and I don't normally return items like this....I tried returning after my first application and I received notification that I am not able to return this.......just keep that in mind if you do decide to purchase this. I'll use my natural deodorant instead....this was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Scibi

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't really work
customer_reviews.text: Has a very tacky feeling. Does prevent chafing, but it definitely does not feel like skin is gliding smoothly. Maybe it works better for skin to fabric contact, but for skin to skin, it doesn't really solve the problem.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mullen

customer_reviews.title: Sticky and Did Not Work
customer_reviews.text: I have large thighs that chafe if I wear shorts or a skirt without undershorts and I really wanted a product that I can use on my vacation (i dint want to wear shorts ALL the time). I tried this product at home before i took it on my trip and i'm glad i did. This product did not glide on easily and felt closer to hair pomade than whatever it was supposed to feel like. It felt sticky and my legs were sticking together, not gliding at all. I threw it away and just made due with shorts or deodorant with baby powder.
customer_reviews.author: Koopaqueenie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, safe, clean product!
customer_reviews.text: Our family lives at the beach! Recently my son started complaining about a rash in his inner thighs. Being petite in size for 6 I originally assumed it was being caused by the lining of his swim trunks... but he’s always running back and forth from sand to water and playing all day etc. Any who we tried everything from powder, to cutting out the inside of his swim trunks, to wearing underwear with swimsuit, etc etc etc. I stumbled across this on a search and I couldn’t be happier!! And he’s happiest! No more complaints, no more boo-boos, no more rash!!!! 🙌🏼 Wonderful, safe, clean product!
customer_reviews.author: Stanley

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: I swear...I love wearing shorts in the summer and I may not be a very large person, but my thighs will rub so raw and so quick. I used this for a 3-4 day outdoor festival. I walked over 27 miles and simply applied this right before I left our camp and maybe once or twice more just to be sure I was good. It worked! I never felt any pain or anything. The best product, I will definitely but this again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Salena

customer_reviews.title: Definitely greasy.
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the package, it was entirely covers with oil. I’m guessing it’s because the temperature in NY is currently in the 90s and it sat on my porch for awhile until I got home and it began to melt. The brand boasts that this isn’t greasy however, it’s definitely and exactly that. It feels greasy when applied between my thighs and I’m constantly aware of it. I specifically bought it because it claims to be non-greasy but I was let down. I’m sure it will prevent me from irritation, however my bad review and dissatisfaction is based on the fact that the brand claims it’s not greasy feeling, when it fact, it is.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Not really a fan.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the dreaded thigh 'chub rub' when wearing dresses. I found that this product didn't really work for me. It made my skin feel kind of waxy and sticky. It didn't stop chub rub. I wouldn't repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa W.

customer_reviews.title: This was essential last summer
customer_reviews.text: I forgot about this product, and how much it helped me. I'm 5'9, 150lbs and never had I experienced such awful upper inner thigh chafing (even encroaching on my family jewels O_O, it was really, really uncomfortable as I walk a lot for work) as I inexplicably did last summer. Naturally a very sweaty man I wondered how this product would hold up and I am happy to say I could get a bare minimum of 4-6 hours of excellent relief, and it starts to peter off from there if you do not reapply it.
customer_reviews.author: Last, First

customer_reviews.title: Great product no chafing
customer_reviews.text: My runner needed something that would prevent chafing when running 40+ miles per week. We tried other products that were stickers but didn't quite do the job. He was using the their brand for the foot blisters and that works great! Decided to use that and no more chafing. Haven't been disappointed with the company's products. He recommends this to his team mates that are encountering the same issues. Would definitely recommend this to any xcountry & track runner.
customer_reviews.author: Pat K

customer_reviews.title: Makes chafing worse!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for days out on the boat. I am not a girl with a thigh gap, so I was looking fir something to prevent chafing when swimming or sweaty. This product does absolutely nothing to prevent chafing. In fact, I think it leaves a sticky residue that made chafing worse for me. Save your money and don’t bother buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Molly E.

customer_reviews.title: LIFE SAVER!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I got this for vacation. Walking around in bathing suits and short shorts in Cancun, in and out of the water, the humidity, I am so glad I had this. One time I forgot to put it on and I noticed right away. Glad I had it with me. Always kept it with me and put it on after "drying off" with a towel. It seemed to hold up well after being in the water as long as I didnt wipe it off. I normally live in a dry climate and I know my thighs would have been raw without it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie W

customer_reviews.title: Tried because of reviews. Not good for me.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure what to expect because I normally use Monistat chafing cream. The first day i used this I felt like my thighs rubbed together worse than Normal. It even made them a little bit sticky I would say. On days where I didn’t sweat so much I found it to work a little bit, but it doesn’t work nearly well enough for me to purchase another. Maybe it doesn’t work in extreme heat , I work outside in Florida and it’s normally over 100 degrees for my 12-15 hour days. Im not sure. I would rather use deodorant between my thighs than this for less friction.
customer_reviews.author: Heather S

customer_reviews.title: Stops the chaffing... Not just for exercise
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product now for a few years when running or on hot days. Before running: I apply it to my inner thighs, feet, under my arms, and around the bra area and it completely covers the areas to avoid chaffing. The glide is smooth and goes on like a deodorant. I could be out there for 5 hours and it's still doing its job. I also use this on hot summer days to avoid chaffing around the inner thighs. Way better than using coconut oil.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: I was a skeptic...
customer_reviews.text: I have tried everything -- baby powder, deodorant, vaseline, and other "chub rub" type products -- none of them hold a candle to this stuff! While I haven't worn it working out or anything, I have been able to wear a dress out of the house without spandex shorts for the first time in years. It may not last hours upon hours, but it held up pretty good for a just running a few errands. Plus, it doesn't cause my skin to break out between my thighs which is a huge benefit!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L. Purnell

customer_reviews.title: Not clear when it's applied
customer_reviews.text: Not clear as in I don't know, to be clear it's invisible when it goes on, but I never know if I'm using enough because it applies very thinly which leads to overuse, at least personally. The stick goes away way too quick for the price you should be getting much more than they're giving. It always feels as if they fill the tube halfway because with daily use now that I'm working out this stick is gone in about 2 and a half weeks. I'll be trying a spray after my experiences with this.
customer_reviews.author: Good Ole JR

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for a vacation to Disney and when I tell you this was my life saving purchase I mean it. I get chub rub and it can be painful. In the past, I would just use pain relief products after the fact but using this to prevent has been life changing. I had a great vacation with zero pain. I still use it when I know I will be walking a lot in the heat. I have recommended this product to several friends who have all said it worked for them as well!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Multi use amazing stick!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a shot in the dark to help with chub rub on my inner thighs. The stuff works amazingly and anyone with problems should give it a shot. I've even thrown it on under my arms on my sides where my shirt tends to rub and it has helped that too!
customer_reviews.author: SinonBC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cyclists!
customer_reviews.text: I got this when hubby complained of chafing when rising over 20 miles. He lost weight and his padded undershorts or bibs started rubbing certain areas. He already has Assos cream but i guess it wasn’t helping in more private areas so I found this stick. Perfect!! Now he can ride a century and doesn’t complain about being chafe. No smell, no allergic reaction, no digging your fingers in a jar. Winner winner chicken dinner!
customer_reviews.author: Tanich2uTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: No odor, no slime, just EXCELLENT chafe / rubbing protection.
customer_reviews.text: As a runner who does half marathons, this is both an important "must have" and also a Godsend! It'll REALLY help with the elimination (or at least greatly reduce) areas of chafing. Even in places you don't normally think about but turn nasty in long runs (like the seams of socks, seams of shirts, etc..). It's not expensive, easy to apply and lasts a long time. No odor, and it's not slimy. Tried many different brands, but still come back to this one.
customer_reviews.author: FlyboyyyTop Contributor: Running

customer_reviews.title: It's sticky and not smooth
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the reviews I was really hoping for a miracle. Unfortunately it did not happen. I applied it on my inner thighs and it was super sticky. It added a lot of friction instead of a smooth glide. Until when it arrived part of it had leaked into the gap. This item is not applicable for returns so even if you get a damaged item you end up paying the price for it.
customer_reviews.author: K. More

customer_reviews.title: Wish I bought years ago!! Saves you pain!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd round with BodyGlide. I work a lot of the day outside and last summer I chafed at least once a week in this Texas heat. It was ridiculous. I tried boxer briefs, compressions shorts, other things. Once I started using BodyGlide (and still wear boxer briefs) I have not chafed since. I swear by this product!! Just apply a few swipes to each of your upper inner thighs and you are good to go for the day!! Thank you BodyGlide!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Teen approved
customer_reviews.text: I mentioned something about my son getting chaffing when he works out or runs a lot and someone recommended this. He's tried several other things and he said none works as well as this. My 15 yr old said it works very well. I will be getting another one for my younger boys who have trouble with swimsuits chaffing. We live in FL, so between water or sweat, it's a real issue. Teen approved. If he's happy Momma's happy.
customer_reviews.author: G Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Almost worth what I paid for it.
customer_reviews.text: It works. It does keep the "diaper rash" at bay. My legs don't get red and raw, and I can go outside without fear. The only two things I didn't like were the tiny size (yes, I think it's tiny!), and the fact that it doesn't start out smoothly. There's some kind of drag? It works great on parts that don't move (like under my breasts), but it has a bit of built-in friction in the parts that do move (like thighs).
customer_reviews.author: Diana Hirsch

customer_reviews.title: stopped my chafing immediately
customer_reviews.text: I had a terrible summer in florida this year with the high temps and humidity and started to chafe every time I wore my sport bra (5x a week) so bad. It was painful and my skin was breaking in places all along my sport bra band. powder and/or vaseline did not help. I found this product, and have not had even 1 episode of chafing once I started using it. it's easy to apply; i just put it anywhere my sportbra band touches front and back. haven't chafed not one time since i started using it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff ever.
customer_reviews.text: IF you have problems with C nuggets or chaffing, this is EXACTLY what you need. Going for. a run? Going to Disney world? Taking a vacation overseas? No matter, put this on, like deodorant, wherever you chaff and it will never chaff again. I needed this product decades ago. Happy to have it now. Oh, it also is great unaffected by water. I have hiked 12 miles, swam in a lake and hiked back 12 miles, and it still protected me from chaffing.
customer_reviews.author: BestAmazonReviews

customer_reviews.title: Beware of allergic reaction.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a trip to Disney World where it was hot and humid and we were doing lots of walking. The product works! However I developed itchy raised hives everywhere I used it. I wasn’t certain if it was this product or other new products I had used at the same time but I used it again recently and now I’m sure - I am allergic to some ingredient in this product. I don’t have sensitive skin and rarely have allergies to products but the hives are miserable and last several days. I am sad I’m not able to use it but it’s not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff I've ever found
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is super! Hands down best anti-chafe over anything else I've used/found, even when used after you've been badly chafed which is a life saver. No mess, pulls double duty as a deodorant with a pleasant smell, and doesn't stain your clothes like some of the other ones do. The medium size seems to be the most handy to use, more so than the large size, but the smaller size is nice to have along when hiking, mtn biking, etc.
customer_reviews.author: GeoPat

customer_reviews.title: If you want to not chafe during workouts, this stuff works.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to prevent possible running during 5 mile walks in high humidity and heat. Pretty impressive. Never had chafing before, but definitely prevented it. Makes skin slide with no friction. Doesn’t dry easily. Takes a bit of work to get off when in the shower which was interesting to say the least. A couple of times with some soap and a loofa and it’s gone. Does it’s job well and that’s all I can say.
customer_reviews.author: Mopar Madness

customer_reviews.title: Stop using baby powder and switch now
customer_reviews.text: I have huge thighs from previous military life and I weight lift all the time. Sometimes I would have to straight leg waddle like a duck because chafing got so bad. My GF got me this because she was tired of our bathroom looking like a blizzard hit it. I was very reluctant. However, I haven't touched baby powder in months now! Worth every penny. My military friends use it on ruck marches. I haven't chafed since I bought it, baby powder felt amazing but it went away as sweat built up. This stays all day! I
customer_reviews.author: James Redden

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, effective product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Living in Phoenix, AZ, wearing skirts in the summer is a sure fire method to chafe the inner thighs. This product completely prevents that! I also used it for my wedding, and didn't chafe for the entire 12 hrs I was in my dress, walking, dancing, etc. Also, my skin can be quite sensitive, and I've had no adverse reaction to it, at all. I'll be ordering more, when this is gone, and have recommended it to several friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product is fake and may burn your skin
customer_reviews.text: Fake product— do not buy. I have used Body Glide for years and thought it would be convenient to replenish through Amazon. The product I received was greasy, badly scented and worst of all burned my skin. I wrote to Body Glide directly and they sent me replacements, but be forewarned that if you buy this from amazon you do so at your own risk. Incidentally, in the interim I discovered that Gold Bond makes a similar product, which I found at Walgreens. So I would suggest you buy directly from Body Glide or find a very suitable alternative at your local drugstore. Keep on running!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Yost

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: I've so happy I discovered this product. After working several jobs that require I walk a lot, as well as working in a hot factory, I can honestly say that this stuff has been a real game changer for me! I have a desk job now but I still put this on almost daily, especially if I'm camping or hiking. Chafing used to be a real issue but I haven't had a single problem since using this! I continue to buy and recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Ross

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: The best stuff ever. If you like wearing short skirts, running, or even hiking- this is a must. Chafing is a thing of the past and it’s so nice not having to worry about taking wide steps to keep the skin on my inner thighs from running. The husband also says it’s great for men chafing while running as well for the certain areas that you hate when they rubs. 10/10 we will be getting more when this is out, but it will last quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: UpDown

customer_reviews.title: It works! But stinks
customer_reviews.text: My job is pretty physical (I work in production in the music industry) and I'm prone to chaffing on my thighs. This stuff is WONDERFUL. I never chafe when I use this. HOWEVER....when I use this and I've sweat a bunch, it puts off an unpleasant odor, similar to stale burnt rubber. I don't know if it is a reaction to my own pH or what, and it certainly doesn't deter me from using it, but beware. I love this stuff and will continue to use it through the stink!
customer_reviews.author: Jaimeejamzx

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever
customer_reviews.text: I used this on a trip to Disneyworld and I will never go again without it. After a day or two at the parks in the heat and humidity my thighs can get so sore it is hard to walk. I put this to the test in July in Orlando and it worked perfectly. I only applied it in the morning. It doesn't really have a scent so is not noticeable. It doesn't feel greasy or moist like some other products. Absolutely the best money I have spent. This would be a great product for working out, also.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: Saved my legs. I've recently increased the distances of my runs from 1-2 miles to now around 7 miles at a time. When i first hit the 5k mark my legs would chaffe (also in the process of losing weight so lots of rubbing going on). I bought this on the recommendation of a family friend and it is just as advertised. I even got the Foot specific one and with the right socks it prevents blisters very well. Would definitely recommend. Only reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is it can be a bit difficult to wash off as it is designed to be water proof.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: My family and I went and played in the Pacific in Malibu. After only 2 hours in the surf, many of us were hurting from chaffing. One of my sons was even bleeding a bit from his nipples. We had purchased this product and bought it with us, however, we had forgotten to bring it to the beach that day. Two days later we went back to the same beach, but this time remembering the Body glide. I was very surprised that after 6 hours playing in the surf not one of the kids, or myself, was complaining about chaffing. I did not expect it to work that well, but it did!
customer_reviews.author: OffDay

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! I have had an expensive swim suit sitting in my drawer for two years. I haven't been able to wear it because the strap rubbed along my shoulder and left me with a very painful rash. A friend told me about Bodyglide and I bought it, never expecting it to work. I wore the suit several times with no problems. Then I was thinking maybe the suit just got softer but yesterday I forgot to put the Bodyglide on and the strap rubbed against my arm again and was so painful! So now I know for sure this product works!!!! Thank you to the makers of Bodyglide.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy O

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter pitches for her softball team. This product helps her so much. She played two games in the heat today. Now that she is using body glide she does not get anymore chaffing. Very happy with the product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Prince

customer_reviews.title: Go-to product
customer_reviews.text: Last summer, I looked at products to deal with chafing. I didn't want to wear leg bands because I was afraid they would fall down my legs, so I looked at powders and creams. I came across Body Glide and I really liked that it was designed like a deodorant tube. This makes it very easy to put on. It leaves a soft, silky feeling afterwards and it really works. On a regular hot day, I can go all day with one application. For extremely hot and sweaty days, I will apply once in the morning and once in the afternoon because it does sweat off. I really like this product and already bought another one for this summer.
customer_reviews.author: NattyNat

customer_reviews.title: Smells like a rotting corpse
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for over 10 years, but now so mad I ordered two for my stock. The return window closed just as my previous stick ran out, and something is wrong with this order - these literally smell like decomposing bodies. They are absolutely unusable, even the worst smell in the gym smells better than these sticks (I checked and the other smells as bad). The consistency is completely different than usual, almost watery, so something went wrong with this stock or it's a fake product. Wish I could get my money back, this is just gross.
customer_reviews.author: budicepenguin2003

customer_reviews.title: Works great, great company
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these through Amazon only because they were the only ones who could deliver them prior to an upcoming long group run. After receiving the sticks, I reached out to BodyGlide through their website, just to verify I received their genuine product from Amazon. Their customer service was excellent and they were able to verify the authenticity right away... I love that I was able to do this. The product itself (assuming you receive the real thing) is fantastic! No chaffing through all of our long training runs or the LA Marathon this last weekend. I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: FM Blanton

customer_reviews.title: Works really well! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My thighs rub together and I have really sensitive skin so it can be pretty painful. I had to avoid wearing dresses and shorts in summer because I was really comfortable. This stuff is so amazing! I feel great moving around with it on. Sometimes I need to reapply throughout the day but it really helps! It also doesn’t leave a gross residue or smell crazy so it’s really discreet.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Why didn’t I know about this sooner?!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! Wish I had know about it years ago. As a curvier woman I use this for thigh chafing in hot weather and it works excellent. Has a stood up to 95 degree weather with high humidity in dresses and shorts. No more discomfort or dreaded rash. Product size is perfect to keep in purse in summer, but generally have not needed to reapply. Just apply before I leave and am good for the day.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is legit.👌
customer_reviews.text: I'm on the chubby side and my thighs are unforgiving. I thought I couldn't wear shorts without some baaaad chafing. I'm talking "Oh God, my legs burn- is that blood??" One day was looking up solutions and found this stuff. Bought it and changed my life forever. I ran out and recently bought another one. I've only used this for my thighs, but I trust it'll work for any of one's chafy problems. My big baddies, worry no more. Get you some of this and rock that mini skirt, short shorts, and bathing suit. Heck, use this when you're in your birthday suit.
customer_reviews.author: Tacia

customer_reviews.title: Pregnant in the summer? Sweating an issue?
customer_reviews.text: I was 5 months pregnant in the middle of June and I was getting a lot of rashes due to sweating under my breast (I know.. it's a lot of information, but honest). When I finally found this stick, it changed the game for me. Before you get dressed swipe where you need and DONE! Problem solved. Trust me you won't be wasting your money or time.
customer_reviews.author: Way

customer_reviews.title: Stay on for a long time and it works!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a truck driver and WAS complaining about chaffing between his thighs. Not anymore! This works and he uses after showering. I advised him to wear it after a shower and before bedtime to let it work. He thanked me. It’s the first time, he felt great in a long time. There’s no need for messy powders and it doesn’t wear away. It stays on for quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Lee

customer_reviews.title: Stops all nipple rub problems
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for a single purpose, to prevent nipple chaffing and this does that 100%. It does not matter what shirt I wear running if I put this on first I don't have a single issue, if I dont put it on then I will feel it later that day. Really like that there is no scent and it does not appear to leave any residue on my shirts. I will never run without this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: No More bat wing
customer_reviews.text: Guys. Get it. I can walk like I haven't been riding a horse all day. No more bat wing. Even my triathlon friends use this stuff. It took me 40 years to discover this product. Don't be like me, buy it now.
customer_reviews.author: spideyns

customer_reviews.title: Summer Freedom
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. Summer freedom in a roll on tube. I've tried the cute little lace bandoleers for your thighs but found the elastic starts to itch after a little while. This stuff is so much better. It doesn't feel gross after you roll it on. Isn't overly smelly, and does its job perfectly. The best way to deal with chaff issues in my opinion. Bring on the summer dresses!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith L. Fahey

customer_reviews.title: This is truly the original anti-chafing balm.
customer_reviews.text: This is truly the original anti-chafing balm. I run half marathons and I am training for my first marathon. It is amazing the parts of the body that will chafe over time. I won't get into the specific locations but it is very uncomfortable and I figured I needed to do something about it. I bought this and I use it before my weekly long runs and it has worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Myron TTop Contributor: Lego

customer_reviews.title: Holy Moly!
customer_reviews.text: My thighs have touched my entire life and I have always just put lotion in between them or deodorant - both of which just seem to be useless after an hour. I received this package two days ago and have used it twice already. It lasted the entire day, and I have absolutely no chafing at all! This is a MIRACLE! I am going on a vacation next week and I am so excited to have this product to use. PLEASE buy it!
customer_reviews.author: kaila

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Runners
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic. I recently started running and was looking for a solution to chaffing. After trying various different remedies I gave this a shot and I do not regret my decision. Pros - Effective at preventing and reducing chafing - Odorless - Size of the balm is small so east to take on the go Cons - Does not last all day. May have to apply more than once depending on your situation Overall this was a worthy purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: I’m a new runner and bought this to help my skin get used to chafing. It’s just okay for my skin type. It feels a tad bit more tacky than I would like. However it has soothes my skin that was already a bit raw.
customer_reviews.author: TeacherMom

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: This did not work for thigh chub rub at all. It was incredibly thick, not silky or lubricating to help thighs glide, more like to help cement them together. You would be better off using lotion and then just hoping it's hot enough to help melt the lotion enough to lubricate your thighs against chub rub. Not sure on how it would work for any other chafing, maybe if you use it for something different it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Bloduwedd

customer_reviews.title: Necessity for long runs!
customer_reviews.text: After my 1st bloody nipple Half Marathon, I discovered Body Glide to prevent the chafing! Works great anywhere that runs (chest, arms when I'm wearing a pack, and between the legs/groin area). It's worked GREAT! The only time I use anything else other than Body Glide is when I will be submerged in/out of water repeatedly. Then I use Gurney Goo (it holds up better with really wet conditions like Spartan Races or Tough Mudders).
customer_reviews.author: Eric Sky

product_meta.title: Body Glide Original Anti-Chafe Balm
feature_bullets: Apply before you get dressed, on thighs, neck, arms, and anywhere skin is rubbed. Stop trouble before it starts
Made with allergen free, plant-derived ingredients. Vegan approved, never tested on animals. Child safe.
The preferred choice over messy, wet creams, gels and powders. No petroleum, lanolin or mineral oils.
Effective and longlasting. Use daily in humid and dry conditions for a pain free active life.
Keeps pores clog free. Sweat escapes and lets skin breathe. Clothing, footware and wetsuit safe.
